about_the_game:
Bedtime Stories 2 - A Fully Voiced Adult Visual Novel
Immerse yourself in this fully voiced adult visual novel, featuring outstanding voice actors and actresses bringing every character to life. With rich sound effects (SFX) added to enhance both SFW and NSFW content, this interactive story promises a captivating experience.

Episode 1: Love Rekindled
Cindy and Michelle embark on a passionate love adventure, rekindling their connection after years apart. With Cindy’s 32nd birthday approaching, Michelle plans to surprise her with one of three presents—each leading you down a different path. The choice is yours.

Episode 2: Behind The Lens
In this episode, Stephanie’s control and manipulation take center stage as she draws Addison deeper into her web. Will Addison escape her influence or succumb to her charm?

Episode 3: Superhero Party
At 20 years old, Cindy finds herself invited to a mysterious evening with Josh, Esmeralda, and Innes. What surprises lie in store for her on this unique adventure?

Episode 4: Villa Vacation 1
Stephanie takes charge of the SOFI team, spending time with her models. Young Cindy faces challenges with some of the girls but also discovers new friendships in this high-stakes villa vacation.

Episode 5: Echoes of the Heart
Cindy's emotional journey begins as she struggles to choose between her fiancé Jax, a rock star, and her long-time love, Michelle. Will she follow her heart or her obligations?

With dynamic storytelling, branching paths, and a fully voiced cast, Bedtime Stories 2 invites you to explore complex relationships, power struggles, and emotional choices. What will you uncover in each episode?
